description: This Java source file defines the class MockTemperatureMeasurementCluster, which extends MockCluster and implements the TemperatureMeasurable interface. It provides functionality to simulate a temperature measurement cluster with attributes such as measured temperature, min/max values, and tolerance. The class includes methods to set and get the measured temperature and to retrieve attribute data as byte arrays.

classes.name: MockTemperatureMeasurementCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a temperature measurement cluster that can simulate temperature readings and attributes for testing purposes.

methods.name: setMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Sets the current simulated measured temperature value.

methods.name: getMeasuredTemperature
methods.description: Returns the current simulated measured temperature value.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves the byte array representing the specified attribute's data, particularly for the measured temperature attribute.
